document_data.name: Water Constrictor
document_data.mainbody: '''Water constrictors''' were a species of [[constrictor snake|constrictor]] [[snake]] that could be found in the waters of [[Icewind Dale]].
document_data.Combat: A water constrictor attacked by, as its name would suggest, constricting its opponent with a force strong enough to bring down even a [[verbeeg]].
document_data.History: In the aftermath of [[Drizzt Do'Urden]] and [[Wulfgar]]'s attack on [[Biggrin]]'s secret base in [[Kelvin's Cairn]] in [[1356 DR]], a fleeing verbeeg was led into a mountain pool by [[Guenhwyvar]], where the giant was attacked and drowned by a water constrictor lying in wait.
